verses.verse: I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> again, and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> with a <S%H4060>measuring<s%> <S%H2256>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H575>Whither<s%> <S%H1980>goest<s%> <S%H859>thou?<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, To <S%H4058>measure<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and <S%H4100>what<s%> is the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof.
And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4397>angel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him,

And <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H7323>Run,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> young <S%H5288>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> as towns without <S%H6519>walls<s%> for the <S%H4480>multitude<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> and <S%H929>cattle<s%> therein: <S%H8432><s%>

For <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> unto her a <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and will <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her.

Ho, <S%H1945><s%> <S%H1945>ho,<s%> come forth, and <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have spread you <S%H6566>abroad<s%> <S%H853><s%> as the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H310>After<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> hath he <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> he that <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> you <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> the <S%H892>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5130>shake<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to their <S%H5650>servants:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H3588>for,<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> I <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H3867>joined<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people:<s%> and I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me <S%H413>unto<s%> thee.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H127>land,<s%> and shall <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%>

Be <S%H2013>silent,<s%> O <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is raised <S%H5782>up<s%> out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4480>habitation.<s%> <S%H4583><s%>
